function.name: GetBool
function.DescriptionEN: GetBool(name) : returns the convar as a boolean flag.
function.DescriptionCN: GetBool(name) : 将指定的控制台变量（convar）作为boolean返回.

function.name: GetCommandClient
function.DescriptionEN: GetCommandClient() : returns the player who issued this console command.
function.DescriptionCN: GetCommandClient() : 返回输入该控制台指令的玩家

function.name: GetDOTACommandClient
function.DescriptionEN: GetDOTACommandClient() : returns the DOTA player who issued this console command.
function.DescriptionCN: GetDOTACommandClient() : 返回输入该控制台智力的DOTA玩家

function.name: GetFloat
function.DescriptionEN: GetFloat(name) : returns the convar as a float. May return nil if no such convar.
function.DescriptionCN: GetFloat(name) : 将指定的控制台变量（convar）作为float返回. 不存在时返回nil

function.name: GetInt
function.DescriptionEN: GetInt(name) : returns the convar as an int. May return nil if no such convar.
function.DescriptionCN: GetInt(name) : 将指定的控制台变量（convar）作为int返回. 不存在时返回nil

function.name: GetStr
function.DescriptionEN: GetStr(name) : returns the convar as a string. May return nil if no such convar.
function.DescriptionCN: GetStr(name) : 将指定的控制台变量（convar）作为string返回. 不存在时返回nil

function.name: RegisterCommand
function.signature: void RegisterCommand(string variableName, handle function, string helpText, int flags)
function.DescriptionEN: RegisterCommand(name, fn, helpString, flags) : register a console command.
function.DescriptionCN: RegisterCommand(name, fn, helpString, flags) : 注册一个控制台指令.

HowToCall.Parameter: string variableName, handle function, string helpText, int flags

function.name: RegisterConvar
function.signature: void RegisterConvar(string name, string defaultValue, string helpText, int flags)
function.DescriptionEN: RegisterConvar(name, defaultValue, helpString, flags): register a new console variable.
function.DescriptionCN: RegisterConvar(name, defaultValue, helpString, flags): 注册一个新的控制台变量.

HowToCall.Parameter: string name, string defaultValue, string helpText, int flags

function.name: SetBool
function.DescriptionEN: SetBool(name, val) : sets the value of the convar to the bool.
function.DescriptionCN: SetBool(name,val) : 将指定控制台变量（convar）设置为指定bool.

function.name: SetFloat
function.DescriptionEN: SetFloat(name, val) : sets the value of the convar to the float.
function.DescriptionCN: SetFloat(name,val) : 将指定控制台变量（convar）设置为指定float.

function.name: SetInt
function.DescriptionEN: SetInt(name, val) : sets the value of the convar to the int.
function.DescriptionCN: SetInt(name,val) : 将指定控制台变量（convar）设置为指定int.

function.name: SetStr
function.DescriptionEN: SetStr(name, val) : sets the value of the convar to the string.
function.DescriptionCN: SetStr(name,val) : 将指定控制台变量（convar）设置为指定string.
